= Ginvoicing installation instructions =

To build and install local mode application from package:
  * Requirements:
    * Eclipse 3.5 (Galileo) +
    * Google Plugin for Eclipse

  * Download package from (http://code.google.com/p/ginvoicing/downloads/list)

  * Decompress package and import in eclipse:
    * File > Import > General > Existing Projects into Workspace
    * Select folder application.

  * Compile with icon: GWT Compile Project

  * Run > Run as > Web Application

  * Go to: http://127.0.0.1:8888/Ginvoicing.html?gwt.codesvr=127.0.0.1:9997
